snippet: When 800,000 bikers traveled to South Dakota this month, some left on their Harley-Davidsons as newlyweds.
abstract: Tens of thousands of motorcyclists have been roaring up on Harleys to Sturgis Motorcycle Rally in Black Hills of South Dakota for annual week-long rally since 1937; marriage ceremonies add to festivities, with 122 marriage licenses issued to Sturgis attendees in 2015 alone; most couples make sure their vows are written with a biker spin, and leather often mixes with boots when it comes to ceremony attire.
lead_paragraph: When 800,000 bikers traveled to South Dakota this month, some left on their Harley-Davidsons as newlyweds.

headline.print_headline: Leather, Lace and Boots Mix at Biker Weddings
headline.main: Leather, Lace and Boots Mix at Sturgis Motorcycle Rally Weddings
